text: Savitar is a fictional supervillain and an antagonist in DC Comics appearing in the Flash comics. == Fictional character biography == He is an immensely powerful speedster who leads a cult that worships the Speed Force. He desires to drain any enemy speedster of their powers in order to live up to his name as a god. He has fought many speedsters, including Wally West, Jay Garrick, and Barry Allen. == In other media == A variation of the character appeared in the third season of The CW's live-action television series The Flash, played by Grant Gustin, and voiced by Tobin Bell. == Source == * Some text was copied from Savitar (DC) at Villains Wiki, which is released under a Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 (Unported) (CC-BY-SA 3.0) license. title: Savitar (DC Comics)
